title: If any area as mentioned in 14
clause_text: If any area as mentioned in 14.1.1.2 is excluded by the project proponent for calculation of FSI, then the mandatory town level amenities and 2% area to be handedover to local authority shall be calculated on the net area by deducting such excluded area from the gross plot.
section: Public Assembly Facilities :- Town Hall and / or Auditorium including Library

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
